name: Wave Of Democracy
description:
Convert as many voters to your side as possible to reach 50 percentage of votes. Presidency is at stake. Wave your hand to the crowd in exchange for their votes! Be careful, though. Your hand is sensitive. You should watch your stamina and rest your hand before you have to wave it against a big crowd!

WASD - Move President

Mouse - Aim

Mouse Left Click - Wave

Note: WebGL version has less people on the streets compared to the Windows build (one third), which is where the screenshots were taken. You can also download the Windows and the MacOS builds. MacOS version has a few updates missing, I guess it's impossible to reach a score of 50 on that one.

Arhan Bakan: Programming, Game Design

Fatih Altınok: Programming, Game Design (itch.io Profile)

Volkan Ongun: 3D, Game Design (itch.io Profile)

Müberra Kablan: Illustration, Game Design

Barış Yaman: Music (Niragaza Dıbrışka)

Made for Global Game Jam 2017 in Ankara, Turkey.
